Detailed Description

The class StringComboBox provide a extention of QComboBox to select an item.

Since:
0.9.0.0

This special combo box add a property value that can be used to change dynamically the current index with a string value, instead of change the value of the lineedit.

This combobox can be used by QDataWidgetMapper who change the user property of the widget.

Property Documentation

QString StringComboBox::value [read, write]

Return the current value of the combobox.

The current value is equivalent to the currentText method.
